meanings.definition: Expressing or covering much in few words; brief in form but comprehensive in scope.
meanings.sent1: Her conciser explanation made it easier to understand the complex topic.
meanings.sent2: The conciser version of the report was more effective in conveying the main points.
meanings.sent3: His conciser jokes always got the most laughs from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The conciser route through the forest saved us a lot of time and energy.
meanings.sent5: The conciser summary highlighted the key findings of the research study.

meanings.definition: One who is concise in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: As a conciser, she was known for getting straight to the point in meetings.
meanings.sent2: The conciser in the group was always able to convey ideas clearly and effectively.
meanings.sent3: The conciser's ability to summarize long texts quickly impressed his classmates.
meanings.sent4: She was a conciser, cutting through unnecessary details to focus on the main message.
meanings.sent5: The conciser's talent for brevity made him a sought-after editor in the publishing industry.
